experience.description:
Developed and deployed a feature-rich React Native app, available on the App Store.
Utilized NativeWind for seamless, responsive styling, ensuring a cohesive user experience across different devices.
Implemented WatermelonDB for efficient offline-first data management, enhancing app performance and user experience.
Integrated advanced features like push notifications, real-time updates, and smooth navigation, adhering to best practices in mobile app development.
Collaborated on UI/UX design, ensuring a visually appealing and user-friendly interface.
key_achievements: Developed and deployed a feature-rich React Native app
Utilized NativeWind for seamless, responsive styling
Implemented WatermelonDB for efficient offline-first data management

experience.description:
Led the development of HorizonView, a dynamic and responsive company website using React.
Integrated Sanity as a headless CMS, enabling flexible content management and easy updates for non-technical users.
Designed and implemented modern, visually appealing interfaces, ensuring a strong online presence for the company.
Focused on performance optimization, achieving fast loading times and a smooth user experience across various devices.
Collaborated closely with stakeholders to ensure the website met business goals and user expectations.
key_achievements: Integrated Sanity as a headless CMS
Designed and implemented modern, visually appealing interfaces

experience.description:
Worked on building a SAAS product using React and firebase.
Demonstrated ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams, adapt to evolving technologies, and contribute effectively to the development lifecycle
key_achievements: Worked on building a SAAS product
Demonstrated ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams

experience.description:
Proven experience in developing and maintaining web applications.
Proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
key_achievements: Proven experience in developing and maintaining web applications

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description:
Developed a comprehensive E-commerce website using React, Redux, and SCSS for state management and styling.
Implemented cart functionality with real-time totaling and checkout processes, enhancing the user shopping experience.
Integrated Firebase for user authentication, real-time database management, and secure payment processing.
Ensured responsive design and seamless user interactions across various devices, improving customer satisfaction and retention.

projects.name: Space Launch Project
projects.description:
Built a Space Launch project powered by Node.js and MongoDB, leveraging NASA and SpaceX APIs for real-time data retrieval.
Implemented robust backend architecture using Express for efficient API handling and routing.
Employed Mongoose for schema-based data modeling and MongoDB for scalable database management.
Used Jest for unit testing, ensuring code quality and reliability.
